activities.name: Santa Monica Pier Carnival
activities.description: Enjoy classic carnival rides, games, and food at the famous Santa Monica Pier.

activities.name: Hollywood Walk of Fame Tour
activities.description: Explore the stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame and visit iconic spots like Grauman's Chinese Theatre.

activities.name: Griffith Observatory Stargazing
activities.description: Take in breathtaking views of the stars and the LA skyline from Griffith Observatory.

activities.name: Seattle Great Wheel
activities.description: Ride the famous Ferris wheel at the waterfront and enjoy stunning views of Seattle.

activities.name: Pike Place Market Food Tour
activities.description: Discover Seattle's food scene with a guided tasting tour of Pike Place Market.

activities.name: Museum of Pop Culture
activities.description: Explore exhibits on music, sci-fi, and gaming at Seattle’s unique Museum of Pop Culture.

activities.name: Portland Japanese Garden
activities.description: Experience peace and beauty at the world-renowned Portland Japanese Garden.

activities.name: Voodoo Doughnut Tasting
activities.description: Try some of Portland’s most famous and creative doughnuts at Voodoo Doughnut.

activities.name: Powell's City of Books Visit
activities.description: Explore the largest independent bookstore in the world, Powell's City of Books.
